description:
Saint Cecilia is beloved by the townspeople—not only is she elegant and composed, she benevolently shares her wisdom with all who seek it. That is, until the last person has left—at which point she becomes totally hopeless! Only Pastor Lawrence, is keeping the Saint put together enough to do her duties...and though she may test him, it's all in a day's work!

(Source: Kodansha USA)
synonyms: The White Holy Woman and the Black Priest

Die Heilige Cecilia und Pastor Lawrence

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

node.description: Ruka Kawada is a Japanese composer, orchestrator and keyboard player from Hokkaido Prefecture, Japan.

__[Website](http://www.clarismusic.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ClariS_Staff)__ | __[Artist Page (Sacra Music)](https://sacramusic.jp/artist/#claris)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ClariSofficial)__ | __[YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-zeaPnxZHE3EcTyVl1fTdw)__

__Formed:__ 2009
__Genres:__ J-POP, Synthpop, Pop rock, Anison

__Biography:__
ClariS is a Japanese singing group under record label [Sacra Music](https://sacramusic.jp/) (2017-), having previously been under [SME Records](https://www.sme.co.jp/s/SME/company/SML?ima=3832) (2010-2017) the group consisted of two high school girls who gained popularity through the video sharing site Nico Nico Douga as “アリス☆クララ" ("Alice☆Clara") in 2009 and 2010. They have since changed their name to “ClariS” for their major debut in 2010, which means “sunny, clean and bright” in Latin. Since they were still high school students and wanted to focus on their school studies, they would not reveal their identities. Therefore, they would only be shown as illustrations. They both started their high school education in April 2012, according to their official Twitter.  When drawn, Clara is depicted wearing pink items, and Alice is shown wearing blue items. Images of the crescent moon are used as a motif to represent Clara, and the sun is used to represent Alice, which comes from their personal preferences. Clara is shown with slightly wavy hair and no bangs, while Alice is drawn with straight hair with bangs.

In 2014, Alice left ClariS to focus on her studies. Clara was then joined by her friend Karen whom she met when they were classmates at the same music school. When drawn, Karen is depicted wearing pastel green items, and images of stars are used to represent her.

On the 1st September 2024, ClariS Karen announced her graduation after ClariS AUTUMN TOUR 2024.

__Members:__
- Clara (クララ) (2009-)
- Ellie (エリー) (2025-)
- Anna (アンナ) (2025-)

__Former Members:__
- Alice (アリス) (2009-2014)
- Karen (カレン) (2014-2024)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ccarrollbeard) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/colleen.clinkenbeardvoiceactress)

An American voice actress and theatre actress, working mainly in the commercial and dubbing industries. She has also served as ADR director, line producer, and script writer for several anime titles for Funimation.

She gave birth to her first son, Rhodes Vandelo Carroll, on September 4, 2014.

Jad is an American voice actress and ADR director who works for Funimation and Sentai Filmworks. Her name is an acronym of her parents' names, Jimmy and David, and is pronounced as Jade. Her singing led to her first voice role in Sasami: Magical Girls Club as Eimi Mori, and her first major voice role was Masako Hara in Ghost Hunt. She graduated summa cum laude from Texas Wesleyan University with a Bachelor of Arts in Music in 2005.

(Source: Wikipedia)
